author: kwright
msg: Revamp build.xml to (a) separate derby test targets from no-database-needed test targets, and (b) introduce end-to-end load test targets, running out of a separate folder (so Maven won't run them).  Part of CONNECTORS-87.

author: benniven
msg: - fixed faulty column size detection for decimal data-types

msg: SLING-2221 - refactoring CacheEntry into separate class for encapsulation reasons and making binary property values non cacheable
